WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Closing for more info:

Can you run Visual Studio with the following command line 'devenv /log' and attach the activity log from here: 

%appdata%\Microsoft\VisualStudio\12.0\ActivityLog.xml

to the bug. 

Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
